title: Cord, after 1850
medium: Medium: silk, metal thread and cotton
description: Strands of silk and metal thread woven in an ornamental pattern around a cotton core. a] black silk and silver thread - b and  d] silver thread - c and e] gilt thread - strands of silk and metal thread wrapped around a small core are twisted together to form a larger cord.

tombstone.epitaph: Cord, after 1850.Medium: silk, metal thread and cotton. 1944-77-1-a/e.
